string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

search.slidetext: hint: hover and click over the different blocks. noteworthy achievements click to see this candidate’s noteworthy achievements and skills. if you are not impressed yet, this section will do just the trick! education background click to see this candidate’s education background. this section will give you insight to their qualifications, work ethic, and capabilities. employment history click to see this candidate’s most recent and relevant employment. this section will highlight the experiences that make buena jill galleposo the most suitable candidate for your company. education background noteworthy achievements employment history most recent: learning technologist at ncc education > click to view more buena jill galleposo

buena jill galleposo education background noteworthy achievements employment history most recent: learning technologist at ncc education > click to view more buena jill galleposo employment history learning technologist elementary teacher research assistant customer service click on each one to uncover buena’s experience in each position.

back to employment history customer service 2010 - 2022 buena jill started working in the customer service and retail industry during her junior high years back in 2010 buena jill was able to achieve and demonstrate success in both aspects of her life (work and school) by receiving countless employee of the month awards whilst maintaining a distinction in all of her classes and degrees it was during these formative years that she started to develop and hone her interpersonal and intrapersonal skills, as well as her logic and analytical skills buena jill continued to work on various industries and companies - some of which are multinational corporations – whilst juggling full-time studies (i.e., junior high to postgraduate studies) <

back to employment history june 2022 - present learning technologist translate digital improvement project requirements into digital solutions and product features, which execute the product vision and enrich internal and external user experiences develop interactive, engaging, and impactful digital learning and training solutions advise on configuration, testing, implementation and support for a set of digital solutions and associated content work with colleagues and technical experts to design and create engaging e-learning tools, providing creative flair and imagination to ensure that the e-learning tools are innovative and informative <

back to employment history elementary teacher elementary teacher march 2021 – june 2021 owned delivery of an expanding programme and curriculum in accordance with alberta's program of studies developed unit and lesson plans for science, math, language arts, social studies and physical education monitored and supported overall student progress and development using excel and powerschool encouraged learning experience to provide students with opportunity to achieve individual potential contributed to raising standards of student attainment and achievement by delivering stimulating lesson plans prioritised and delivered all aspects of interactive teaching including vles/lms and game-based and gamification learning platforms such as kahoot!, blooket and socrative established and maintained student relationship and trust <

reading research lab research assistant < performed data collection, including structured assessments of individual students conducted analysis to always ensure validity and reliability of data while preparing reports and summaries delivered compliance within research procedures as well as following ethical guidelines for interaction with children hyperhistory lab research assistant < conducted research regarding canada’s role and response to holocaust primarily responsible for focusing on historiography and media surrounding ms st louis incident collaborated with primary researcher’s investigation and translated data gathered into formally-written paper back to employment history may 2019 – april 2020 research assistant < hyperhistory lab supervisors: dr. van kessel and dr. gibson reading research lab supervisor: dr. george georgiou 2019 2020 drag the magnifying glass on the dates to further inspect buena’s experience in each lab.

click on each education level to reveal more information about buena jill’s educational journey. high school bed elementary ma digital technologies, communication and education with distinction with distinction with distinction

high school with distinction click on each education level to reveal more information about buena jill’s educational journey. bed elementary with distinction ma digital technologies, communication and education with distinction high school with distinction received the social justice award for showing dedication to improving the school community received the rutherford scholarship for academic excellence excelling at senior level of high school at a young age… buena jill was already interested in exploring the technologies at that time to determine how they can be used to tell various stories. during this time, buena jill developed a youtube account that received the following honours for a video they had created in 2009. honours: #30 - most discussed (today) - nonprofits & activism - canada #2 - top favorited (today) - nonprofits & activism - canada #48 - top rated (today) - nonprofits & activism – canada their favourite tools to use were: sony vegas pro and audacity. click on the picture to view a sample! received the summa cum laude award for receiving an average of 90% or greater across all subjects < back to education background

high school with distinction bed elementary with distinction click on each education level to reveal more information about buena jill’s educational journey. bed elementary with distinction ma digital technologies, communication and education with distinction < back to education background received the celebration of excellence award five times throughout their undergraduate degree. this award honours undergraduate students who have exceptional academic achievement and who have also demonstrated professionalism and leadership in their classes. a student may receive this award up to five times during their undergrad. received the jason lang award all throughout undergrad awarded to students who have displayed outstanding academic achievement at a post-secondary level. received the roger s. smith award this award is intended to cultivate and support research partnerships between undergraduate students and faculty members in sshrc fundable disciplines. click on each tile click on each tile to explore them!

high school with distinction ma digital technologies, communication and education with distinction click on each education level to reveal more information about buena jill’s educational journey. bed elementary with distinction ma digital technologies, communication and education with distinction < back to education background click on each tile click on each tile to explore them! as buena embarked on their master’s degree, they slowly began to realise their interests in gamification, game-based pedagogy, artificial intelligence (ai), and vle/e-learning design, specifically how we can use these technologies to mitigate the disadvantages that marginalised groups, such as bipoc learners and learners with exceptional learning needs, experience. buena jill hopes to combine the skills and knowledge they have gained both as a teacher and a student with their acquired insight and expertise in technology to improve and develop new educational technologies, interfaces, and e-learning materials and resources.

virtual tutor - campus unicef 2020 - 2021 • created and hosted a free tutoring service offered to elementary and junior high students, helping to alleviate stress for students transitioning to new modes of learning as result of covid19 pandemic vp events - poverty, homeless & awareness gala 2019 • hosted university of alberta’s campus unicef’s first gala to spread awareness and education about poverty and homelessness • liaised with unicef to discuss and champion actions able to be taken to mitigate these specific issues microsoft office, teams, sharepoint, cloud-based software - outlook, dropbox, google workplace html5, css3, javascript, e-learning - kahoot!, blooket, socrative, google classroom, articulate storyline 360, zoom, skype , moodle research, ethics and privacy protocols, safeguarding, risk assessments, health & safety adobe suite: spark, photoshop, premiere technical skills click to view a course prototype i designed for 6th graders using articulate sotryline < go home
